Comment: Unless they are a real mover and shaker like Pelosi or McConnell, a lot of senators would benefit more from state level grifting than they do at the federal level. They’ve already proven they can win state wide elections so it makes sense. You’d be less likely to see this with state reps because their win was within their district. If they are a kook, likely so is their constituency. They don’t have to have the same broad appeal a senator or governor has to have.
